subtitle: hello everyone welcome I'm so glad you could make it today we've got something
very special for you this is the day that will go down in history for certain
the insights that have led to today's announcement comes after a wave of
profound revelations we've had whilst participating in sacred plant medicine
ceremonies at rythme a-- in November of 2017 we announced patch taro the spirit
science tarot deck along with a digital copy of the book of patch our 600-plus
page handbook written all about taro the ancient mysteries Kabbalah and the
roadmap to ascension we were amazed by the reception you gave this bundle we
received over a thousand pre-orders for it and in several short months we sold
out of our entire stock it was incredible to see the quantity and
quality of testimonials we received from you all who espoused the profound and
deep revelations that were experienced as a result of using these cards really
it blew us away to have people tell us that this deck changed their lives in
such positive ways so thank you from the bottom of our hearts it is such an honor
to share in this creation with you and we are especially excited for what
happens next pache Tarot is evolving striving for
perfection and growing closer to five over the last few months we have been
developing some changes to the cards that we know you're going to love all
while retaining the best qualities that you already have grown so fond of the
new deck is now printed on a thicker cardstock
going from 300 GSM to 340 GSM which provides a more firm and durable card we
have also increased the image quality which has jumped from 300 dpi to 1200
dpi this is four times pixels per inch over the original cards which provides
not only a significantly higher quality but a much more vibrant image for you to
enjoy and explore it especially allows you to see all of those little details
in the image that may have been harder to see on the original print in addition
to these changes the cards themselves are also just a
little bit smaller than they were previously we did this to support people
of all hand sizes to be able to shuffle them with ease however they're not so
small that it hinders the image size or is annoying to shuffle for people with
large hands and if this wasn't good enough we've also updated the mini
booklet with print that is significantly easier to read than the first version we
also now have extra mini booklets available for sale as a standalone item
for anybody who wants one or had trouble with the original version but that's not
all on the face sides of the cards we are very excited to announce an overhaul
to the borders even though the cards are smaller we wanted the images to be
bigger and more vibrant than ever before and so we have entirely redesigned the
borders to make them horizontally edgeless
every single card has this border and when they're positioned in order and you
flip them gently like a flipbook the border background art actually moves
pretty cool huh however the biggest change to patch taro has actually got to
be this you see we are at the end of an era we are shifting ages as the dawn of
this golden age begins we move into a new paradigm of being and with this new
paradigm comes a new understanding in the past the one who walked the path of
awareness and transformation was called the fool in older Italian decks he was
called limit or Amato which means the madman or the beggar now in those days
the one who walked the path of the fool probably did seem like a little bit of a
madman to the rest of society but that doesn't change the fact that the meaning
of this character was the embodiment of the innocent consciousness walking the
path of discovery and awakening and so this is why today we are announcing the
end of an age and the beginning of a new one the age of the fool is fading away
and in its place we begin the age of the child
the child embodies all of the same qualities of the fool but teaches us the
truth that all of us have this unique innocent and creative spirit within us
we are all walking the path of discovery and we are all constantly learning and
growing through various stages of life the child makes one more big change
which is that she has two numbers in addition to the zero the card also has
taken on the number one you might find this strange but the reasoning for it is
purely Kabbalistic you see the value of Aleph is 1 and Aleph is the Hebrew glyph
affixed to the child we've spent a great deal of time
meditating on and exploring the relationship between the Hebrew letters
and the cards we explored the possibility of moving a left to the
magician moving the child to have Tov the glyph of the crown but in the end we
discovered the deepest and purest resonance on the 0 and 1 together for
the child the Alpha and the Omega the masculine and the feminine the beginning
and the end the Beyond and the here and now all of which emerge from and return
to the state of perfect innocence the heart of a child
doing so has realigned all of the cards respectfully to their Tree of Life
glyphs perfectly now the magician who is numbered 2 matches its Hebrew letter bet
which also holds the value of 2 and speaking of the magician he too has gone
through a metamorphosis we realized that in our world today magicians are
illusionists they manipulate your idea of what is happening but it is always a
trick Wizards on the other hand actually shape engineer and conjure realities and
so today the magician has also been updated to be renamed the wizard and we
gave him a memorable scarf to match the occasion the last major change we wish
to share with you is the Hierophant with its new moving to the position number 6
aligning with Tifa debt the Christ sphere on the Tree of Life
we found occasion to give it an especially powerful recognition and so
it's number at the top of the card is now represented by the holy six pointed
star describing the pure embodiment of soul embody throughout this deck you
will also find a number of other subtle changes to the art but all of your
favorite imagery are still entirely present and all of the changes are fully
disclosed inside of the book of patch which has been revised and will be
available for download with this new deck the moment that it ships out to you
with all of that said we've put together a fun video highlighting these changes
and we are honored to share it with you now when we created patch tarot we saw
it as a living archetypal organism we knew that the more we practiced and
experienced these archetypes our understanding would evolve too and so
the cards could be subject to change over time as all things do since we
launched the original deck we have grown so much and now the cards have also
evolved as a result the changes we've made are fundamentally game
our desire with patch taro was to make the highest quality of cards we possibly
could and continue to push the limits of that quality so that every new edition
of patch to row feels like a brand new experience entirely but retains the
spirit and intentions of the original version with this new deck the physical
cards themselves have been made stronger and more durable going from 300 to 340
GSM and printed on a black cork stock this gives you a thicker card and is
less susceptible to warping then we reduce the card size by about 10
millimeters on each side making it easier to shuffle the cards on the card
fronts we've entirely redesigned the borders as
well so even though the cards are slightly smaller the images are actually
bigger giving more attention to the cards vibrant art work and symbology
along with this the cards are now printed at 1200 dpi with four times more
resolution than they had previously making it easier to enjoy all the
intricate details on each card
the imagery of the Tarot is incredibly ancient and deeply profound and that's
why when designing these cards we were very careful to reference and research
the oldest meanings we could and merge them together with our modern imagery to
produce the most relevant understanding of each archetype what we've found is
that the cards themselves tell our story and as we worked with them it revealed a
powerful truth about who we are and led us to make several changes to the cards
themselves the biggest change is the shifting of the fool into the child
whose number also shifted from zero to zero and one together making the symbol
for Phi this was done to mark the beginning of the new age of awareness
and the revelation that all of us are on this journey of discovery together and
that we are not fools but merely children children learn grow and have
all manner of life experiences and this is the story being told by the Tarot
we've also maintained the change of the reversal of the Emperor and the Empress
which balances the masculine and feminine dynamic in the first four cards
of the Major Arcana aligning the Empress with the Hebrew letter hei which is the
principle of femininity and describes that the Hierophant the wise master and
birth of Christ consciousness comes through the Divine Feminine with this
new edition of patch Tarot there are enough major updates here that it has
become an entirely refreshed and new experience taking the Tarot one more
massive leap away from the old paradigm and into the 21st century
yet honoring with reverence all of the lessons and wisdom of our ancestors a
new age is upon us and this deck is a mark in the timeline of Earth's history
to show it pache Tarot come as a child thank you for all of the lessons
the deck is available for order right now and the cards are set to ship out

and the updated book for 30% off if you already have patch Tarot please

supporters will also receive discounts relative to your pledge as well and with

there's just one more thing we have an app
the patch Tarot app is available now and we've made a really fun video to
highlight the features of this app with the patch Tarot app we wanted to bring
the experiences of divination to your mobile device so that in the times when
you don't have the physical deck with you you can simply pull out your phone
and get the divine insight that you're seeking it makes the cards accessible
everywhere anytime of course building this app had to be done with the utmost
care and attention in order for the cards you are drawing to accurately
reflect the experiences you're having and to give the most relevant and
meaningful insights we have seen the research that shows how random number
generators can synchronize with each other and cease to be random when mass
consciousness puts its attention and focus on something all at the same time
therefore the functionality of the app works using the same principles the
moment you press the swirling vortex the consciousness of the electrons within
your device will begin to synchronize with your own consciousness as you put
focus on your question the cards you receive in the reading will show you
exactly what you need to see every time our intention with the app was to make
patch Tarot available to everyone so that more people could begin to really
absorb the information of the Tarot and put these archetypes and principles to
use in their lives the app comes with a variety of features making it easy to do
simple and advanced readings every card comes with a simple description and
reading followed by a more advanced explanation it lets you do readings of 1
2 3 5 and 10 card spreads and the best of all is that it lets you save your
readings so that you can come back and reference them later on
finally the app comes with a full card directory so that if there was any one
card in particular that you wished to read about you can do so at your leisure
so with this fully functional divination tool now available you too can start to
unfold the mysteries of these ancient archetypes and help discover the joy of
life in every moment we're so grateful for all of the help and support we've
received during the creation of patch tarot and this new mobile app so from
the bottom of our hearts we express gratitude and appreciation for each and
every one of you thank you peace and love namaste
the app has launched with the original version of the carts and will
automatically update with the new generation when the new cards ship out
it will then also have the ability to toggle between the original and the new
edition thank you all so much for coming to this presentation and for evolving
with us as we take our collective consciousness to new heights till next
